Q2 2015 NACCO Industries Earnings Conference Call
CLEVELAND Aug 18, 2015 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of NACCO Industries Inc earnings conference call or presentation Wednesday, August 5, 2015 at 2:00:00pm GMT
